HL7v2xStaticDef.EventDesc: Unsolicited transmission of an observation message

Component.Name: namespace ID
Component.ImpNote: Sending application for this message will be set to IM (Instrument Manager)

Component.Name: namespace ID
Component.ImpNote: Receiving application for this message will be set to VBECS (Vista Blood Establishment Computer Software)

Component.Name: namespace ID
Component.ImpNote: Receiving facility is the code of the hospital in which the patient resides (e.g. 589 for VA Heartland).

Field.Name: Placer Order Number
Field.ImpNote: Order Number consists of the combination of Patient Specimen ID (up to 15 chars) and Donor ID (13 chars) for the total of 28 characters

Component.Name: entity identifier
Component.ImpNote: This fields holds Specimen ID for patient specimen tets or Donor ID for blood unit tests.

Component.Name: namespace ID
Component.ImpNote: This field is used to hold the Donor ID for the crossmatch test only.

Field.Name: Universal Service Identifier
Field.ImpNote: This is the name of the blood test (e.g. TAS for Type and Screen, XM for Crossmatch etc..)

Component.Name: second and further given names or initials thereof
code identifying the check digit scheme employed

Field.Name: Specimen Source
Field.ImpNote: Not all blood bank analyzers are capable of sending this information. Depending on an instrument we will be getting Specimen Source of "Blood" or nothing.

Component.Name: second and further given names or initials thereof
code identifying the check digit scheme employed

Field.Name: Placer Field 1
Field.ImpNote: Name of the blood bank analyzer (aka. Automated Instrument)

Component.Name: OBX-3 observation identifier of parent result
part of OBX-5 observation result from parent

SubComponent.Name: placer order number; universal ID type
filler order number: universal ID type

Component.Name: second and further given names or initials thereof
code identifying the check digit scheme employed

SubComponent.Name: second and further given names or initials thereof
second and further given names or initials thereof
second and further given names or initials thereof
second and further given names or initials thereof

Field.Name: Observation Identifier
Field.ImpNote: Name of the individual phase of the blood test (e.g. AntiA, AntiB, A1Cell, BCell, ABOInterp, RhInterp)

Component.Name: second and further given names or initials thereof
code identifying the check digit scheme employed
